Submit a signed transaction (spend bundle) to the blockchain network.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Request parameters for the submit_transaction endpoint","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Submit a transaction to the network","required":["spend_bundle"],"properties":{"spend_bundle":{"description":"Spend bundle to submit","type":"object","required":["coin_spends","aggregated_signature"],"properties":{"aggregated_signature":{"type":"string"},"coin_spends":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","required":["coin","puzzle_reveal","solution"],"properties":{"coin":{"type":"object","required":["parent_coin_info","puzzle_hash","amount"],"properties":{"amount":{"oneOf":[{"type":"string"},{"type":"integer","format":"int64","minimum":0}],"title":"Amount"},"parent_coin_info":{"type":"string"},"puzzle_hash":{"type":"string"}},"title":"CoinJson"},"puzzle_reveal":{"type":"string"},"solution":{"type":"string"}},"title":"CoinSpendJson"}}},"title":"SpendBundleJson"}},"title":"SubmitTransaction"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response from submit_transaction","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response for transaction submission","title":"SubmitTransactionResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - invalid parameters or malformed JSON"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized - no wallet is currently logged in, or authentication is required"},"404":{"description":"Not found - requested resource doesn't exist (e.g., NFT, offer, transaction)"},"500":{"description":"Internal server error - unexpected failure in wallet operations"}}}
